src:
KPK Cecar Eks Wabup Lampung Utara soal Anggaran Proyek Dinas PU
07 Nov 2019, 19:03 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - KPK memeriksa mantan Wakil Bupati Lampung Utara Sri Widodo terkait kasus dugaan suap Bupati Lampung Utara nonaktif Agung Ilmu Mangkunegara. Sri Widodo dicecar KPK anggaran proyek Dinas PUPR dan Dinas Perdagangan.
"KPK mendalami informasi terkait dengan peran para saksi terkait dengan anggaran dan proses pengadaan proyek di Dinas PUPR dan Dinas Perdagangan," kata Kabiro Humas KPK Febri Diansyah kepada wartawan, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Sri Widodo diperiksa bersama mantan Sekda Lampung Utara Syamsir. Kedua diperiksa sebagai saksi untuk Agung.
Agung dijerat KPK sebagai tersangka dugaan suap pengadaan sejumlah proyek Dinas PUPR dan Dinas Perdagangan di Lampung Utara. Dia diduga menerima suap terkait proyek-proyek itu melalui tangan orang kepercayaan serta kepala dinas.
Agung diduga menerima duit total Rp 1,2 miliar dari sejumlah proyek di Dinas Perdagangan dan Dinas PUPR Lampung Utara. Duit itu diterima secara bertahap.
Untuk proyek di Dinas Perdagangan, Agung diduga sudah menerima suap Rp 200 juta. Sementara dari proyek Dinas PUPR, diduga Agung telah menerima suap total Rp 1 miliar.

(ibh/haf)
text:
KPK Cecar Ex Wabup North Lampung about Public Service Project Project Budget
Nov 7 2019, 19:03 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - The KPK is examining former Vice Regent of North Lampung Sri Widodo related to the alleged bribery case of North Lampung Regent inactive Agung Mangkunegara Science. Sri Widodo was criticized by the KPK, the project budget of the PUPR and the Trade Office.
"The Corruption Eradication Commission investigates information related to the role of witnesses related to the budget and project procurement process at the PUPR and Trade Services Offices," KPK Kabiro PR spokesman Febri Diansyah told reporters on Thursday (11/07/2019).
Sri Widodo was questioned with former North Lampung Regional Secretary Syamsir. The two were examined as witnesses to Agung.
Agung was charged by the KPK as a suspect in the alleged bribery of procurement of a number of projects of the PUPR Service and the Trade Service in North Lampung. He is suspected of accepting bribes related to these projects through the hands of a trusted person and the head of service.
Agung is believed to have received Rp 1.2 billion in total from a number of projects in the North Lampung Department of Trade and PUPR. The money was received in stages.
For projects in the Trade Office, Agung is believed to have received a bribe of Rp. 200 million. While from the PUPR Service project, it is suspected that Agung has received bribes totaling Rp 1 billion.

(ibh / haf)
